quote: Happiness is free, but the world makes it expensive.
Jeane de La Fontaine once said: Sadness flies away on the wings of time.
Ambrose Bierce once said: Speak when you are angry and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.
Lao Zhu stated: He who is contented is rich.
Mahatma Gandhi once said: Peace is its own reward.
